metadata.title: Comprehensive Agentic AI Tools Catalog
metadata.subtitle: A Strategic Guide for Government Decision-Makers

insights.title: Rapid Market Growth
insights.description: The AI agent market reached $7.92 billion in 2025, with government adoption accelerating across all sectors.

insights.title: Security & Compliance Priority
insights.description: 95 tools now offer SOC 2 compliance, with 35 achieving FedRAMP authorization for government use.

insights.title: Shift to Autonomy
insights.description: AI agents are evolving from simple assistants to autonomous systems capable of complex decision-making and multi-step workflows.

insights.title: Government-Specific Solutions Emerging
insights.description: Major vendors are developing government-specific versions with enhanced security, compliance, and citizen service features.

insights.title: Open Source Gaining Traction
insights.description: Government agencies increasingly favor open-source frameworks for customization, security auditing, and avoiding vendor lock-in.

insights.title: Healthcare AI Adoption Accelerating
insights.description: 2 in 3 physicians now using health AI tools, representing a 78% increase from 2023.
